snippet.title: Beastieball - Early Access Launch Trailer!
snippet.description:
Beastieball is launching on Steam on November 12! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1864950/Beastieball Made by Wishes Ultd. (Developers of Chicory & Wandersong) & published by Klei! Coach a sports team of Beasties in this turn-based volleyball RPG! Your Beasties' relationships will grow and change over the course of your adventure, powering up their teamwork! Explore an open world and battle rival Ranked Teams in any order as you climb to the top of the Beastieball League. 

But there's more to Beastieball than playing sports. As the plot unfolds you'll meet friends, rivals, corporate sponsors, and even a mysterious Sports King with grand ambitions...

-------------------------------------------------
Follow & Support Beastieball!
-------------------------------------------------
Website: https://BeastieballGame.com
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1864950/Beastieball/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/beastieball
Discord: https://discord.gg/wishesunlimited

-------------------------------------------------
Places to Follow Klei!
-------------------------------------------------
Follow us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/klei
Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/klei
Subscribe to YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/kleient
Join the Discord: https://discord.com/invite/klei
Official Forums: https://forums.kleientertainment.com/
Klei Shop: https://shop.klei.com

#beastieball #indiegames #videogames
